participant_1.name: Arjun
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and open-minded, Arjun enjoys exploring new ideas and experiences while balancing his traditional upbringing.
participant_1.background: my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool.

participant_2.name: Priya
participant_2.personality: Caring and thoughtful, Priya values her family and lifestyle choices, and enjoys sharing insights about her vegetarian diet.
participant_2.background: i'm married. i'm a vegetarian. my favorite color is blue. i am a woman.
